data.title: Chord Overstreet Celebrates His Birthday at Lavo; Neil Patrick Harris at Comme Ça
data.meta_description: Chord Overstreet celebrated his 23rd birthday at Lavo at the Palazzo on Saturday. The actor and singer best known for his role on the television series Glee was accompanied by a large group of...
data.text:
Chord Overstreet celebrated his 23rd birthday at Lavo at the Palazzo on Saturday. The actor and singer best known for his role on the television series Glee was accompanied by a large group of friends including co-star Harry Shum Jr. Deejays Lupe Fiasco and Sky Gellatly, the partners for Soundclash, dined at Lavo last Tuesday night. [EaterWire]

How I Met Your Mother star Neil Patrick Harris dined at Comme Ça at the Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas Friday evening with a large group of friends. Harris and his fiancé David Burtka were in town to celebrate a friend's birthday. The group ordered a Grand Plateau, the brasserie's two-tiered presentation of chilled seafood dishes as well as the filet mignon. [EaterWire]?

Actor Chazz Palminteri dined at Simon Restaurant & Lounge at Palms Place Sunday evening. Palminteri ordered the shrimp cocktail to start and the organic chicken for dinner. He also sipped on a glass of Justin Cabernet and pumpkin cheesecake for dessert. Singer Trey Songz had a late lunch at Simon on Saturday before his performance inside the Pearl Concert Theater. Songz ordered Simon’s surf and turf tacos, the turkey chop chop salad, spicy tuna roll and Leitz Dragonstone Riesling. Actress Vanessa Marcil from General Hospital dined with friends at Simon last Tuesday night. Marcil ordered the wok charred edamame and the grilled chicken Caesar. [EaterWire]

Corey “Big Hoss” Harrison from Pawn Stars dined at N9NE Steakhouse at the Palms Sunday evening. Harrison started with the rock shrimp and chicken wontons followed by the 35-day dry-aged rib eye with mac and cheese, death by potato and creamed corn on the side. Oakland Raiders quarterback Carson Palmer dined at N9NE on Saturday evening. Palmer ordered garbage salad followed by the Kobe burger with a side of potato gnocchi. For dessert, he treated himself to crème brulee. [EaterWire]

On Sunday afternoon, actor and former NBA star Rick Fox and his girlfriend, actress Eliza Dushku, dined for the second day in the row at Society Café in Encore Las Vegas. Fox picked the Society vegan tasting and the Green Monster extracted juice. [EaterWire]

On Friday night, former NBA player Karl Malone dined with his family at Wolfgang Puck Bar & Grill at the MGM Grand. On Saturday afternoon, actor Tony Danza had lunch at the bar. Also on Saturday afternoon, singer Chris Isaac had lunch there, ordering chicken soup and Chinese chicken salad. On Sunday, after the Keep the Memory Alive concert singer and actor Lenny Kravitz, actors Larenz Tate and Terrance Howard, magician David Copperfield and music producer Quincy Jones all dined at the restaurants. [EaterWire]

Playboy Playmate Jayde Nicole celebrated her birthday at Sugar Factory American Brasserie at Paris Las Vegas Saturday night. The frequent guest on E!'s Holly's World and MTV's The Hills ordered a grilled steak and arugula salad with a table of her five best friends. Singer and actress Samantha Mumba held her engagement party with longtime love Torray Scales the same night. Mumba ordered creamy artichoke and spinach dip, mixed green salad with roasted tomatoes, cucumbers and balsamic vinaigrette and pan-roasted Pacific salmon. The Irish singer received a King Kong Sundae made with 24 scoops of ice cream for dessert. Randy Fenoli of TLC's Say Yes to the Dress dined with friends and former *NSYNC member Joey Fatone bought a bag of Swedish Fish in the retail store. [EaterWire]

Amber Riley celebrated her 26th birthday Saturday night with dinner at Seablue by Michael Mina at MGM Grand. The actress is best known for her role as Mercedes Jones on Glee. [EaterWire]

Sammy Hagar celebrated the launch of his new rum, Sammy’s Beach Bar Rum, at his Cabo Wabo Cantina Friday night at the Miracle Mile Shops inside Planet Hollywood Resort. The Red Rocker hosted a private event along with close friend chef Emeril Lagasse. [EaterWire]

Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue models Crystal Renn, Nina Agdal, Chrissy Teigen and Izabel Goulart stopped by Mastro’s Ocean Club at Crystals at CityCenter on Wednesday to help chef Wayne Shumaker create one of the restaurant’s signature dishes. [EaterWire]

Chord Overstreet from Glee continued his birthday celebration at Tao Asian Bistro at the Venetian Sunday night. Stevie Wonder made a late-night stop at Tao Asian Bistro Saturday night and dined in the private dining room. The group ordered Tao-tinis and orange chicken, Kung Pao chicken, Chilean sea bass and sushi. On Thursday night, Mark Ballas dined at Tao Asian Bistro. The Dancing with the Stars pro was joined by friends ordered Buddha chicken, wok sirloin and satay bass. Rapper Lil Jon and friends dined on Buddha chicken and miso soup that same night, as did Washington Redskins cornerback DeAngelo Hall of the Washington Redskins, who ordered crispy spicy tuna roll and satay of bass. Rapper Wale dined at Tao Asian Bistro Tuesday night. [EaterWire]

Jaime Pressly was spotted dining at Strip House inside Planet Hollywood Resort on Tuesday night. The I Hate My Teenage Daughter actress and a friend shared crab cakes, a 12-ounce filet and 16-ounce Strip steak along with macaroni and cheese, green beans and broccoli. [EaterWire]
